item.description:
Since the July Meetup falls during Readercon I encourage you to attend the Saturday session. We will see each other off and on.

For the Meetup, we will gather in the lobby near the check-in desks, at 6:00 pm. and carpool to dinner, probably Sichuan Gourmet in Billerica. We will return to Readercon at 8:00 for the Kirk Poland Memorial Bad Prose Competition.

We will return to your regularly scheduled Meetup in August.

group.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston SFiction & Fantasy Writers Meetup at Readercon
